Sanctuary:CB_Master.NAME: Cardboard box
Sanctuary:CB_Master.FLAVOR: Put an item inside, take an item out! NL Sincerely, a box lover.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, box all your relics. Right clicking this relic unboxes them. However, they seem to be misplaced with another box and turn into random relics.
